programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land & privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elvira and Robert are looking for a home with a history, but want to make sure it is post-renovation.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jonathan and Kerry are in the market for a new home to share memories in with their family; with a budget of 12 million dollars, Real Estate Agent Tav Schembri is challenged to find the family their dream home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Nathan, a start up company owner and his fiance Kelsey, a owner of a holistic nutrition company, are open to purchasing a house anywhere in the GTA.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Broker Jasmine Xuereb must smooth the way for buyers Cindy and Andrew to decide whether they should buy a house in their homeland or in a different country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Katerina and Mauricio are looking for one property in Canada and a holiday home in Belize, specifically on a private island.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Real Estate Agents Jasmine Xuereb & Laura Compagni team up to aid power couple Jamie and Jennifer in purchasing either a real estate investment in Canada or Belize.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The brokers explore Central America to find real estate options that fit the bill for two buyers looking for a change of scene.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Since working from home has become increasingly popular, Paul and Sonia are entertaining the idea of living and working abroad.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike team up once again with local agent to find a unique opportunities for residential investments.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Alan & Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Rick looks for properties in Canada and abroad; Tav Schembri suggests Caledon; Mike Donia recommends Panama.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura aids Nick Regina and Michael Succurro of Spark Financial Group in purchasing a smart property investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike Donia locates an ultra-luxurious, private paradise for two buyers on Pearl Island, Panama, boasting 30 km of coastline and a rich marine sanctuary.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 He Said He Said Fight
programme.desc: A code red call blares after a fight occurs in the jail’s dorms. Accused of trespassing, a woman removes her clothes from her holding cell. A man is brought into detox after slamming against a cop car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers transfer an over caffeinated suspect to isolation so he can unwind. A man arrested for DUI while doing donuts in a mall parking lot asserts he was robbed. A jaywalking Utah man claims someone hit him on the head. A disgruntled detainee lands a sucker punch on a fellow inmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A night of karaoke results in a domestic-violence charge, and a drunk inmate starts a fight with his cellmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Las Vegas Motor Mouth
programme.desc: A belligerent man with a grudge is placed in a restraint chair. An intoxicated woman receives a love note from an inmate on worker status.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Fight For Your Right
programme.desc: A woman is placed into a restraint chair during intake. Punches are thrown and questions are asked after a fight occurs. After dodging a bar tab, a woman is also accused of spiting and biting.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A violent ruckus ensues after a man is placed in jail. Secret prison communication methods are explored and examined. Later, deputies cautiously extract a disruptive man while his wife is held nearby.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate claims to be the victim of an internet scam which led to his arrest. Officers take it easy on a rowdy inmate struggling through a spiritual crisis. Years of prison time can’t sway a young gang affiliate from changing his ways. Prisoners cause plumbing problems to send a message. A mother and daughter bond over being locked up together.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A prostitute gets busted on a slow work day. An intoxicated inmate tangles with guards, and an angry woman has cross words for a guard.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man under the influence states money will buy his freedom after threatening police with a gun. Individuals arrested for possession blame each other. A man arrested for drunk driving becomes unruly.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An agitated man is overly concerned about his 30K watch. cries when he has blood drawn. An inebriated woman threatens her arresting officers with bodily harm, and a woman has no recollection of her arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL an unruly detainee is sent to isolation, twice. In Multnomah county a young man feverishly waits for his release. In Portland, OR a man is jailed for bitting his girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 I'm Not Jane Doe
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a lewd woman is jailed. In Las Vegas, NV a man is placed in the restraining chair after attempting to bite his own fingers off. In Portland, OR a man is brought in for possession. In Sarasota, FL a homeless man is brought in for trespassing and battery.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Melee in the Cell
programme.desc: A brawl breaks out between inmates during a routine jail breakfast. An inmate alters their uniform in provocative and outlandish ways. Concerns abound as one-man issues violent threats at deputies.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In San Diego, CA an officer grapples with a combative detainee. In Portland, OR six party goers are taken into custody. In Fort Worth, TX a high-risk inmate manages to get the key to his handcuffs.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An arrested man is caught on camera making a run for freedom. An addict returns to jail and tells officers that meth is controlling his mind. Humility may be the key for one man to quit his life of crime. A shoplifter calls 9-1-1 to help him get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In his holding cell, a man fights officers after taking Xanax. An officer discovers a suspect may be facing criminal charges for his son. K-9 units are needed during a search for improvised weapons.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A strip search reveals a male inmate in women's lingerie. A couple of puppy thieves get amorous in the bathroom, and a pregnant woman is arrested for solicitation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two sisters go on a mini-crime spree, get caught and find no one will bail them out. A domestic argument about night fishing lands a husband in jail for breaking into his own car. An irate inmate blows off steam by doing laps in her jail cell. A woman finds out it’s hard to stop selling drugs when the neighborhood knows her business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Angry over her arrest, a woman becomes combative with officers. Busted once again for drugs, a smart young woman knows she is making dumb choices but can’t stop using. A man eluding the police swipes food from his workplace before landing in jail. Officers get a laugh from an arrested panhandler who wants to buy a permit for panhandling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman booked for domestic violence begins screaming and can’t calm down. Two friends arrested for public intoxication embrace in a tearful reunion. Later, a woman is brought in with a stolen car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers fear a man may attempt to hang himself and decide to intervene. A heavily injured man ends up in jail after taking cocaine and acid. Irascibility shadows a man with low blood sugar.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a belligerent woman is restrained. In Portland, OR a repeat offender is placed in isolation for unruly behavior. In Las Vegas, NV a man opens up about how his friends and family feel about him in a holding cell. In Spokane, WA a man is jailed in an attempt to steal coffee for his friends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two agitated inmates are put in restraints to cool down. A suspected burglar expresses concern over a milk allergy, and an inmate becomes upset about the care given to her belongings.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An eccentric jail regular is welcomed back. Man fleeing Mexico details the horrors he escaped. Young woman describes her lucrative fling as a stripper. A woman finds that trying to drink away a bad boyfriend and then asking the boyfriend for bail money is not a good idea. A man collapses during booking after being arrested for drunk driving. Officers have heart to heart with a depressed inmate going through a breakup with a cheating girlfriend.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers conduct a strip search after an inmate is accused of carrying contraband. A repeat offender dances for deputies and fellow inmates. High on meth, a man acts erratically during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cell brawl escalates quickly. After being arrested on her wedding night, a woman has deep regrets and serious reflection. Officers free a man from his own noose and place him on a vigilant watch.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman tries to conceal illegal substances in her bra. Bandmates are charged for tresspassing, and two inmates are separated and placed in restraints after losing control.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Texting, drinking and driving are not a good mix for a mother with her baby in the backseat of her car. After his arrest for shoplifting, a young man begins to realize the consequences of his lifestyle choices. A woman arrested on a warrant finds herself in solitary confinement after showing off her assets to another inmate. Officers try to convince a homeless young man that patching up his relationship with his family is better than being drunk on the streets.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is brought into the detention center hogtied. A disruptive teen is sent to a holding cell. Casino valets tip the authorities about an intoxicated woman leaving behind the wheel.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an honest offender turns himself in. Officers arrest an underage woman who admits to driving under the influence. A woman is taken into custody after harming herself with a pair of scissors

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 One Too Many Times
programme.desc: A man learns it’s never a good idea to light up a joint next to an active crime scene. An officer encourages a young drug addicted couple to seek treatment. Luck runs out for a tutu-wearing prostitute, and officers pick up an at-risk kid for their 93rd time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers have difficulty booking an incomprehensible man. A commotion at a church ends in arrest. A man wearing a tuxedo is detained after mocking officers for wearing “pig suits.”

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL officers place a hostile former Marine in isolation. In Portland, OR officers take a man into custody for joyriding in a stolen car. In Las Vegas, NV a jailed man is more concerned about the condition of his car rather than the people involved in the accident that was hospitalized.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies assist arresting officers by removing an angry man from their patrol car. Violent outbursts plague an arrest. One woman struggles with bail. Three drunk men become wildly emotional.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate fails to impress the staff with his witticisms. A woman boasts about excelling at her DUI field test, and a man learns his wreckless driving has resulted in the death of a man.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After totaling his Corvette, a man is arrested for drunk driving. Complex personality issues are unveiled while an inmate is interrogated. A man is placed in a mask after spraying saliva far and wide.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cologne salesman boasts and promotes his "magic potion". A man bloodies his neighbor in a one-sided feud. Taking an illegal drug has an unexpected consequence to one man’s face. Open Booking becomes a stage as one woman launches her singing career.

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: A man runs from police claiming he heard a gunshot. A woman lays the blame on her boyfriend. Officers confront a man who refuses to come down from a roof.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A bewildered driver claims that he did not see the lights or hear the sirens when signaled to stop. A manager of an apartment complex is assaulted by their intoxicated tenants.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E16 My Bills Won't Wait
programme.desc: A suspect calls the police and states that he wants to kill himself and any officer who tries to help him. None of the three occupants of a stopped car will admit to ownership of a bag of drugs. A man begs not to be arrested so that he can pay child support.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A drunk man threatens both firefighters and the police. Police are called over a dispute regarding an alleged missing dog. A drunk driver changes his story when his friend is found pinned under his car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a motorcyclist driving erratically. Deputies find broken drug paraphernalia in a car when conducting a traffic stop. A man who beat up his girlfriend hides from officers in an attic.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers try to make sense of a store transaction turned wrestling match. An intoxicated woman calls the cops when her boyfriend tries to flush her late husband's ashes. A shirtless man with a nasty attitude defies officers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: The suspect of a carjacking tells an Officer that he would rather go to jail than face the wrath of his mother. An Officer investigates a domestic call involving a husband, wife and a lamp. A slow speed pursuit ensues and the suspects are booked for felony, eluding, and drugs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect fights back with his teeth during an arrest. A man tries to get revenge for his lost cell phone. A woman claims her neighbor slashed her tires for no reason.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E04 There Goes that Alligator
programme.desc: Police arrest a suspect for armed robbery. A six foot alligator is found on a homeowner's back porch. An Officer assists in an undercover sting.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect ditches his bike then tries to outrun the police. Neighbors fight about a road rage incident using rocks and a baseball bat. Suspects in a stopped car attempt to hide all the evidence against them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E30 The One Dollar Shoe
programme.desc: A well-known local nuisance gets caught bothering people once again. Officers get a kick out of a usual suspect with money in his shoe. Cops try to make sense of a man who’s barely coherent and barely dressed.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Prostitute sting operations prove successful for undercover officers. Officers inform an unsuspecting John that the individual offering services is not who he thinks they are.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies respond to a fight between a daughter’s boyfriend and her mother. A woman lights candles after an attempted break-in. Police respond when an evicted tenant tries to reenter his old apartment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E12 Blood and Scars, Bro!
programme.desc: A suspect races through the neighborhood after his scooter can’t outrun police. Cops discover a drugged, incoherent wild man lying in the bushes. Officers try to make peace between neighbors with pit bull problems.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E13 I Take This Criminal
programme.desc: During an arrest, a suspect decides to pop the question to his girlfriend. An abandoned house becomes the target of burglary. Two brothers’ dispute over a business matter leads to violence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man with a knife tries to evade police by hiding in bushes. Vice Unit Officers conduct a prostitution sting. When Officers are shot at during a pursuit, the woman claims it was flashes from a camera.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers encounter an unusual situation where the victim and suspect have defiantly barricaded themselves inside the house. Officers respond to a domestic dispute at a nearby apartment complex.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E19 One for the Road
programme.desc: A man crashes his vehicle after losing control while attempting to evade the police. An elderly woman with an outstanding DUI warrant is arrested for hit and run. Officers discover methamphetamine while investigating two suspicious vehicles on the side of the road.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to an armed robbery and carjacking, the suspects are arrested on several charges. A concerned sister reports a fight between her brother and a heavyset burglar. Officers pursue a stolen vehicle and a high speed chase ensues which ends in a wreck.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Witnesses of a car burglary assist an officer in locating the suspect. An officer investigates a fight involving a young man and a homeless gentleman. A suspect’s testimony is debunked after an eyewitness confirms that his knife wounds were self-inflicted.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two suspects who were believed to have been involved in a robbery. Police attend to a man who has injected a concerning amount of methamphetamine. Officers break up a fight in progress involving two men outside a convenience store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A foot pursuit ends in arrest after a suspected drug dealer attempts to discard his goods. Police are called to a warehouse after the security guard is held at gunpoint. Police assist a young girl after being struck by a car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A chase ends when a driver-less vehicle goes headfirst into an apartment complex. A swift suspect can’t scamper fast enough to evade police. On routine patrol, officers stumble upon a 7-year-old boy who left home alone.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E04 No Respect these Days
programme.desc: A combative man at a fast food restaurant claims his phone was stolen. Multiple illegal items are found on a man parked on the side of the road. An intoxicated man throws an 83-year-old’s walker.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer shows up as Coco the Clown in an undercover sting. The Vice unit conducts a reverse-prostitution sting designed to capture suspected “johns.”

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An extremely understanding cop gives a resistant suspect too many chances. A driver reminds us why we should never let a friend borrow our car. A man with a supped-up vehicle tells an awful lie to police.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers attempt to detain undocumented people crosssing the border. Border patrol discovers a driver with a load of drugs in his car. Officers check passports and a suspicious-looking laptop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Two suspects lead Officers on a high speed pursuit. An Officer discovers two men have warrants after a traffic stop. A man hides from the police after a domesitc disturbance call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Two cousins fight over a five dollar debt. Police arrest a man for domestic violence. A taxi cab driver is robbed and shot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E12 The Car is Mine!
programme.desc: A man locks himself in a trunk after deputies respond to a restraining order call. Deputies respond to two women arguing over the ownership of a car. A driver comes clean to a deputy during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E11 First Do No Harm
programme.desc: A suicidal man tries to taunt police into shooting him. Undercover officers expose an illegal operation at a pain management clinic. A woman claims she’s just a bystander to a motorcycle hit and run.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers make an arrest in connection to an armed robbery with the help of the K-9 unit. Officers respond to a disturbance call at a local restaurant involving the manager and an inebriated patron. An officer pulls over a vehicle which later turns out to be littered with drug paraphernalia.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E35 My BFF Screwed Up
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call of a woman holding a loaded gun to her head. Officers kick in a door to halt an assault in progress. A woman driving a stolen vehicle claims it was purchased by a friend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E16 We Run the Show
programme.desc: A stealthy robbery suspect leads officers on a chase through backyards. After dropping a bag of meth, a man swears he’s only seen the drug on TV. A doped-up domestic violence suspect tries to claim self-defense.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer struggles with a man reaching for something in his pocket. A man won’t cop to the gun in his backseat. Police arrive on the scene when a man threatens to shoot his wife.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect flees as officers respond to a fight call. A belligerent meth user refuses to cooperate after being pulled over. A cranky husband gets busted for pot after his wife kicks over his Harley.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a vehicle traveling up to 100mph. An officer is dispatched to a larceny in progress at a convenience store. Dispatch informs officers that a man threatened an elderly woman.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man is arrested for stealing a large amount of copper wire from a business owner. A bicyclist is charged with possession and public intoxication. A man is pulled over for expired tags.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E05 Put Your Clothes Back On
programme.desc: Cops try desperately to get an unclothed man to cooperate. After a chase with a pickup truck, officers find a 14-year-old in the driver’s seat. On a routine traffic stop, police contend with a plethora of dope and even more lies.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: China celebrates harvest with the Moon Festival, when the moon is at its fullest during mid-autumn. The best part? A delicious feast! Cantonese expert Mary Tang prepares a common Moon Festival dish - earthy and tasty Mushroom Stir Fry. Then, she cooks up a mouth-watering, Cantonese must-have - Steamed Crab. Using flawless technique, Mary breaks the juicy crab into pieces, fries and steams it in scented spices and sauces. Another Moon Festival staple is Cantonese Roast Duck - Mary uses sweet-savoury Chinese five-spice powder, dark soy sauce, and aromatic white pepper to make a fragrant rub. Finally, Moon Cake at the Moon Festival a given. Exquisitely crafted with red bean paste and sweet...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 A Banquet fit for an Emperor
programme.desc: Elegant Vietnamese fare is often inspired by legendary imperial city cuisine. In this One World Kitchen 3 episode, Host Lisa Nguyen gives us a magical taste of royalty with four colourful and delectable dishes. To start, Lisa ex- quisitely assembles a nice little starter for a royal dinner party - delicious Rice Cakes with Dried Shrimp. Next, she kicks it up a notch with a Spicy Hue Beef Noodle Soup - a truly slurp-worthy dish! For a touch of sweetness, Lisa then steams caramelized pork and tender shrimp dumplings in a lovely banana leaf. And there's no such thing as a classy Vietnamese dinner party without Baby Clams with Rice! The blend of contrasting flavours and textures in this...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E21 All Sorts of Spice
programme.desc: Spices are extremely important to Lebanese cuisine and host Jasmin Ibrahim uses a ton of them in four tasty Lebanese dishes. First, she prepares two classic, aromatic toppings for a Lebanese breakfast bread called Mana- keesh. Next up, juicy chicken and smokey freekah seasoned with sweet cinnamon, citrusy cardamom, pungent all spice, and black peppercorns. This dish captures the essence of Lebanese cuisine. Moving on, Jasmin then makes a thick and spicy beef stew. It's eaten vermicelli rice and seasoned with a classic Lebanese 7-spice combo. Fragrant and delicious, this dish can be served family-style for everyone to enjoy! For dessert, Jasmin whips up a wonderfully rich batch of Spiced...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Home cook Joanna Chery prepares a series of traditional Greek dishes including Stuffed Vine Leaves - a classic dish made of lemon-doused grape leaves and stuffed with fluffy rice, fragrant herbs, and juicy beef. Then, she prepares a healthy and hearty dish called Giant Baked Beans. Typically used as a side, it pairs well with Jo- anna's next dish - succulent roast lamb and lemony potatoes. Finally, Joanna makes a Greek specialty - Fried Dough Ribbons. Satisfy your sweet tooth with these fried, coiled dough ribbons drizzled with sweet honey and sprinkled with sugar. Simple, fun, and evERS-popular in Greek cuisine, this dish is great for sharing amongst family and friends.

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Portugal, Argentina, India, Japan
programme.desc: Chef Pino Di Cerbo creates veggie dishes inspired by Portugal, Argentina, India, and Japan!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Vijaya Selvaraju makes delectable Indian dishes using versatile Indian spices and flavours.

programme.title: VegHeadz
programme.desc: Nothing screams summer more than salsa, especially chef Pino's sunshine yellow salsa served with grilled halloumi cheese. Yes, please! Next up, snappy snow peas pair with summer strawberries in a sprouted quinoa salad with Champagne vinaigrette! Pino then takes summer sunbathing to the next level, serving up blistered Shishito peppers and buttery radishes with sesame seeds and edible seaweed! For his final dish, Pino sums up summer with a French-style ratatouille served as a salad! Thinly sliced vegetables are lightly marinated before pairing with a fresh carrot purée in a dish that sparkles with summer.

programme.title: Pressure's On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Weeknight Dishes made in Little Thyme
programme.desc: Who has "thyme" to make dinner after a hectic day? Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco inspires with four recipes including a Mushroom Thyme Risotto.

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: Onions, cheese, bread, soup, four elements that live in harmony, especially in this episode of Up the Dish! Poppy Sandler starts off in Paris - classic French Onion Soup with sweet, caramelized onions and melty Comte cheese, with perfect rounds of toasted baguette. Poppy passes it over to Micah Trainor, who doesn't miss a beat; her Tenderloin Roast with Sherry Braised Shallots is sweet, savoury, and bursting with flavour. Tiera Singh takes a chive-y dive into the vegetarian side with her Chive Pesto Pasta - don't worry, the pesto is totally customizable! Missy Hui has the showstopper, Scallion Ash Carrots and Parsnips, and it's a five-star treatment that takes the simple to spectacular!...

programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Papaya Salad, Carrot Hog Dogs, Squid, and Tofu

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Warm and talented Cantonese home cook Mary Tang kick starts this One World Kitchen 3 episode by show- casing traditional, evERS-popular dim-sum dishes. First up, juicy Pork-Filled Dumplings! Made with fresh watERS-chest- nuts, shiitake mushrooms and a blend of Asian sauces and spices, these sweet and salty bite-sized creations are to die for! To add to our desire, Mary fries up some savoury Chinese Daikon Radish Cakes in a piping hot wok. Next, a flavourful lotus leaf filled with sticky rice and a medley of salted duck eggs, Shaoxing wine, and dried shrimp is truly hard to resist! To finish off, Mary combines gorgeous Adzuki beans with rice flour and sesame seeds to create airy and full...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Vietnamese food with a French Twist
programme.desc: Lisa Nguyen, a passionate and fun-loving Vietnamese home cook, introduces us to some of her favourite Vietnamese dishes with a French flare. Set in the colourful One World Kitchen 3 kitchen, Lisa assembles a classic Vietnamese sandwich. Golden-brown sautéed onions, salty bacon, tangy pickled carrots and daikon, and flavourful ground pork p'té pressed between two slices of crispy baguette will definitely get your mouth salivating. Next up, hot pork lathered in cognac inside a crunchy golden puff pastry. Moving away from pork, Lisa then cooks up a hearty plate of Shaking Beef with a leafy watercress salad on the side. Finally, Lisa shows us her Vietnamese play on a traditional French...

programme.title: VegHeadz
programme.desc: Chef Pino Di Cerbo begins his cruciferous crusade with a hearty bowl of broccoli and cauliflower soup, topped with toasted florets and finished with a hit of spicy black mustard. Lastly, chef Pino puts together some fluffy frittata-style muffins packed with tomato and spicy arugula leaves. Bravo brassicas!

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: How many ways can salmon be prepared? Up the Dish is on a mission to find out! Tiera Singh's Salmon Salad NiÃ§oise is a staple of the French Riviera with shallot, eggs, and haricot verts, but she swaps out the tuna for luxuriant olive oil poached salmon - it may not be traditional but it sure tastes good! Poppy Sandler smokes the competition with a buttery Smoked Salmon Omelette, garnished with fresh chives and earthy goat cheese. Next, Micah Trainor skips the salmon but keeps the veggies for her steamed Tofu Nori Dim Sum Dumplings, with tart gingERS-pickled shallots and tons of green goodness. Missy Hui has the big finish; her Salmon with Béarnaise is cooked sous vide for a precisely...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: Turkey, think Silk Road spices. Indonesia, lots of seafood and tropical fruits! Curious and adventurous host Bianca Osbourne is your CombiNATION Plates culinary guide through both food cultures. First, check out Turkish Spice Crusted Lamb Rack with yogurt and blistered peppers. Next, an Indonesian tribute: Crab Leg with Coconut Curry. For the 'common ingredient'? Two takes on tender, savoury eggplant! Turkish Eggplant is braised and served with parsley and feta and the Indonesian take is served with fried garlic and sweet soy. For the CombiNATION Plate? Peanut- chili Sate sauce replaces walnut for Pazili TrancÌ§a, a classically Turkish halibut presentation, also served here with unique,...

programme.title: Up the Dish
programme.desc: In this episode of Up the Dish, host Missy Hui goes back to her childhood with Chicken and Dumplings - comfort food for every age! The chicken-dumpling journey doesn't end there; Micah Trainor turns the dish upside down and inside out with her Chinese-inspired Chicken-Chive Gyoza, a crunchy-crispy dim sum delight, with an ovERS-the-top chili sauce! How does Poppy Sandler spice things up? Herb Gnudi with Red Pepper Sauce, a spicy-savoury dumpling that's coated in nutty brown butter and creamy ricotta cheese for extra oomph. programme.desc: Is there anything more Greek than olives? Host Joanna Chery shows us how versatile the olive really is by cooking up four diverse Greek dishes. To start, a rich, baked-to-perfection Olive Bread loaded with strong, slightly fruity black Kalamata olives. She then prepares a refreshing Greek Village Salad full of seasonal vegetables, creamy feta, and plump juicy olives tossed in extra virgin olive oil. And guess what? It pairs great with fried Olive Bread! Then, Joanna switches it up with wonderful green olives - the star in her delicious stuffing for Apricot and Feta-Stuffed Chicken Thighs. programme.title: Spice Secrets
programme.desc: If mace, fenugreek, and cloves aren't at the front of your spice shelf yet, they will be by the end of this episode! Co-hosts Shahir Massoud and Jasmin Ibrahim bring these spices to a trio of fabulous recipes! First, octopus gets a slow bath in mace-scented olive oil before picking up a smoky char on the grill. A refreshing Thai Mango Salad gets amped up with the big flavour of fenugreek. Lastly, lamb chops get treated to an aromatic marinade of clove-spiked basil and parsley pesto.

programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: Xplore Belgium
programme.desc: Brussels is one of the most cosmopolitan cities of Belgium and also its economic and political center. There are way too many things to do here.

programme.title: Bliss
programme.desc: Most popular destinations of Santorini's main island are the volcano and the hot spring.This is best way to explore this island is on foot.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Best From The Rest Hong Kong Top Sees
programme.desc: While Hong Kong may be a haven for social media brags, a closer look at some of its most iconic attractions exposes its authentic richness.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: Charlie introduces the indigenous handicrafts of Oaxaca, including the whimsical creatures with a unique story.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Kissed By The Sea Penghu Island, Taiwan
programme.desc: Penghu, an archipelago of islands in Taiwan, is a tropical haven infused with oriental flavour. Travel junkie, Alex Drobin discovers this when he enjoys the balance between adventures such as snorkelling and banana boat and exploring the local culture through sights rife with local legends such as a temple dedicated to the goddess of the sea and the Four eye well. He also tries fresh seafood and local Taiwanese dishes such as cactus ice cream.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Bucket List Kagoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty visit Meiji-Gura in Kyushu, Japan, to taste a locally brewed Japanese hard liquor, Shochu. They also go to the Makurazaki region for a special meal of bonito, a Japanese seafood delicacy, prepared for them by world-class chefs, Gaggan Anand and Takeshi “Goh” Fukuyama.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Alex Outhwaite meets the descendants of the royal families of Hyderabad and Lucknow, and they tell her about the culture and cuisine of both kingdoms.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Larnaca in Cyprus is one of the world’s 20 most ancient, continuously inhabited cities for the last 4000 years. Travel enthusiast, Sabrina sets out to find out more about the city but is waylaid when she finds a flock of flamingos at a lake side.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: Charlie’s journey across Mexico begins in La Paz, a quiet escape sitting on the Sea of Cortez that is often overshadowed by Cabo

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici marvels at the architectural wonders of Baku, the capital of Azerbaijan, while also checking out souvenirs at the local bazaar.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E54 Bucket List Fukuoka, Japan
programme.desc: While the rest of Japan remained isolated from the world, Fukuoka’s global flavour was concocted by centuries of trade with its Asian neighbours. Adventurers, Daniel Coll and Paddy Doherty attend a unique baseball game at a rather offbeat stadium in Kyushu’s largest city.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: On a journey to find the lost and forgotten recipes of India, Alex finds herself at Asia’s biggest spice market.

programme.title: Xplore Belgium
programme.desc: The food, the beers, the chocolate and the fries. Bruges is one of the cities that seemed to have skipped 21st century altogether.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Nicosia, the capital of the Republic of Cyprus is also its cultural heartbeat. Sabrina realizes this, as she sets out to unravel the stories of the largest city in Cyprus while being treated to a bath in a Hammam, which was formerly a church.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: People flock to Cabo for those perfect beach vacations. Charlie, however, knows a different side to the destination: the action-packed side.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici visits the city of Ganja in Azerbaijan, where she uncovers the history at sights like Heyder Aliyev Park and Mausoleum Nizami.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bucket List Itoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Why do men camp in the great outdoors? Simply to get some peace and quiet. In this episode, watch Dan & Paddy’s day in Itoshima - a place with soothing waterfalls, fishing pools and perfect beach sunsets to calm the soul.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: From a rich lamb curry to a hearty pulao made with rare mushrooms, Alex learns to make the secret recipes of a local family in Delhi.

programme.title: Xplore Belgium
programme.desc: Market square of Bruges is lined up with restaurants and cafes. The city is also home to golden fries or french fries, but are originated in Belgium.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: In the Troodos ranges of Cyprus, Sabrina Chakici visits the Kykkos Monastery and the ten small village churches, which have become a UNESCO World Heritage Site. She further ventures out to explore the Neolithic village of Khirokitia and learn about the age-old lace tradition in Lefkara village.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: From dolphin-filled lagoons to colonial charm, Charlie introduces the treasures of the least visited state on the Yucatan peninsula, Campeche.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sheki, the silk route city of Azerbaijan, is all kinds of indulgence, as Sabrina Chakici finds out. She learns about the unique play of colour and glass that is Shabaka, a traditional art form, and sees how beautifully it has been used in the mesmerizing Sheki Summer House. She also pampers herself with a relaxing crude oil spa treatment, and goes on to explore Khinalug Village, a hidden gem.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bucket List Gyokuro, Japan
programme.desc: Tea in Japan is a spiritual concept. Attaching ritual and ceremony to it, this country transforms the act of drinking tea to a moment of communion with the universe. Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty find out different ways to relish Gyokuro tea, one of the highest grades of tea available in Japan. They also visit the village where it is grown.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: From papad ka paratha to lehsun ki kheer, Chef Aditya Jaimini shows Alex Outhwaite how to make some of the unusual dishes from Indian cuisine.

programme.title: Xplore Belgium
programme.desc: Renowned as the world's leading city of diamonds, it also holds about possessing the second largest port in whole of Europe.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Lying next to the island's beautiful Mediterranean coastline, in south-western Cyprus, the popular town of Paphos is home to some spectacular archaeological attractions and a rich Cypriot history. Here, Sabrina discovers the myths of the Greek and Roman philosophies, unravels the stories hidden in time at Paphos Archaeological Park, and explores the historic towns of Limassol and Kourion.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Viajar Mexico, Merida Mexico
programme.desc: In the historic city of Merida, Charlie shows around the underground pools, which narrate stories of Mayan beliefs.

programme.title: Kissed By the Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Kissed By the Sea Valletta, Malta
programme.desc: Tara explores Vallettand Vittoriosa town, visiting historical monuments, Barraka Garden, Grand Harbour and learning about Catholic influence on Malta.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Bucket List Ohana, Japan
programme.desc: Among Japan’s best kept secrets is its very own Venice with an oriental flavour to it. Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty visit this hidden gem, and learn a little about Kyushu’s history and Samurai, the legendary Japanese warriors. They also witness an enchanting garden, that is the perfect combination of the creativity of nature and human beings.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Amritsar,where recipes have been passed down generations. Alex explores it in Quest.

programme.title: Xplore Belgium
programme.desc: Antwerp has grown on the banks of the Scheldt River that alongwith the Meuse and the Rhine forms the biggest estuary in western Europe.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: You won't find anything more comforting than food made from scratch.Join Alex in Hoshiarpur as she finds old cuisines.

programme.title: Kissed By the Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Kissed By the Sea Comino, Malta
programme.desc: Tara visits the Comino island and explores the rugged landscapes of Mdina. Later, she learns about locals in Marsaxlokk and enjoys Popeye Village.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 10 Days Cyprus Akamas National Park
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: Xplore Belgium
programme.desc: No matter where you look, you will see impressive, interesting architecture that will catch your eye. Until 1550 Ghent was one of the largest cities.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Bucket List Qura, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll and Paddy Doherty pay a visit to the award-winning swordsmith, Matsunaga Genrokuro in the city of Arao in Kyushu, Japan. He shows them a few things about making the swords used by the Samurai, and how to wield them. They also explore some hidden Christian sites in the Nagasaki region.

programme.desc: Brussels is one of the most cosmopolitan cities of Belgium and also its economic and political center. There are way too many things to do here.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Bucket List Sakurajima, Japan
programme.desc: The name Sakurajima means cherry blossom island - and that is the beguiling name of a fuming volcano in Kyushu. Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try different ways to get up, close and personal with the volcano. What they don’t count on is an eruption.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: Tulum, one of the last cities built and inhabited by the Mayans; Charlie narrates the stories about their reign.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.
